prompts: Create a fluffy Electric-type Pokemon that has a playful personality and loves to explore.
Imagine a cute Pokemon with cotton candy-like features and a cheerful demeanor, perfect for kids.
Show me a pink and blue creature that embodies joy, with a round body and a fluffy tail.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a cute sheep, with vibrant colors and a friendly expression.
Design a Pokemon with soft, cloud-like fur and a spark of electricity in its personality.
Give me a whimsical Electric-type Pokemon with a bubbly appearance and a knack for mischief.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a small, adorable lamb with a bright color palette and lively traits.
